entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 11.
